item.description:
Our first Meetup of 2010

Because it's been a while since we've had more than a few developers in attendance, this meeting is for developers, marketers, users, clients, and partners.

Proposed Agenda
6-6:30pm Networking and food

6:30-7pm Case Study by Revere Group:
"Health Insurance Company Leverages Sitecore to Improve Member Acquisition and Retention"

7-7:30pm Plans for a series of developer workshops (we will have a survey, but please bring your topics!)

7:30-7:45pm General Sitecore questions

7:45pm Adjurn to a local watering hole
item.name: January 2010 Sitecore Meetup - General Audience
